DaD.manager

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.manager.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Clovis on 07/02/2017. Singleton used to display both loading / creating game menu and in game menu when creation / loading is finished.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String[] _inGameMenuOptions
      Options for player once a game was loaded or created.

      Private Instance of class.
      private static java.lang.String[] _mainMenuOptions
      Option for loading / creating new game menu.

      • mainMenu

        public void mainMenu()
        Main menu of the game, where you will choose between starting a new game or loading an old one.
        See Also:
        SaveManager

      • inGameMenu

        private void inGameMenu()
        Main menu once loaded or created a new char.

        From this menu will access to all parts of the game, like entering in a dungeon, save your game, buy items ...
